data.title: ananeuro
data.text:
Heather Travis, NP has resigned effective 9/13/2024. Due to provider shortage, we are currently unable to offer transitional care for her memory care patients. We are referring patients to alternative memory care clinics.

​

Effective January 2024: Annapolis Neurology will be billing the code G2211 for all chronic conditions. Most carriers are paying for it. If your insurance plan does not cover this code and you are billed $16.00, we recommend that you appeal with your insurance carrier.

​We are committed to providing comprehensive and accessible care to all our patients, including through online digital evaluation and management services. It is important for you to be aware that while many insurance plans cover these services, some may not include coverage for online consultations.

In the event that your insurance does not cover the online digital evaluation and management service, you may be responsible for the associated charges minimal of $16-$32 maximum. These charges will be billed directly to you according to the fee schedule of our clinic.

We understand the financial concerns that healthcare expenses may pose, and we encourage you to review your insurance coverage to determine the extent of your benefits for online services. If you have any questions or concerns regarding billing or insurance coverage, please do not hesitate to contact our billing department for assistance.

Thank you for entrusting us with your neurological care. We remain dedicated to providing you with high-quality service, both in-person and through our online platforms.

​​​​

Congratulations to Drs. Hexter and Price for being voted Top Doc by their peers. It will be published in the October 2023 Edition of What's Up Annapolis

​

New Patient Appointments:

We are currently not evaluating new patients for concussion, limb spasticity, memory, Parkinson's Disease or tremors. We hope to be able to accommodate these patients in the future.​​​

​

For new patient memory evaluations: Please feel free to look at the attached support information and contact a comprehensive memory specialists. Annapolis Neurology Associates currently does not have a provider specializing or treating memory loss, Dementia, or Alzheimer's disease.

​

https://www.hopkinsmedicine.org/psychiatry/specialty-areas/memory-center

https://www.umms.org/ummc/health-services/neurology/services/memory-loss-dementia

​

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WOx0aCyE8ZMMo7buXTwBvjnmxNur02dL-ILH8TcvMTc/edit?usp=sharing

​

*** Please click on below link: ***

https://forms.myupdox.com/#/form/50042

Once the Packet has been complete, please allow 7 business days for our scheduling team to contact you with an appointment

Our Providers look forward to meeting you ​

​

We are proud to announce that we have partnered with Chesapeake Cannabis Certifications! Visit https://www.chesapeakecannabiscertify.com/ or text 443-333-9493 for an appointment. Telehealth visits encouraged.

​

​

​

For Additional information please feel free to call Bridgette Dasch or Kristal Niblett at (410)266-9694

​
